body_html: It is a known issue with using EXPERIMENTAL_ACCUMULATE_N with dynamic_rnn. But it really shouldn't be needed for dynamic_rnn's already accumulates internally. @yuanbyu or @ebrevdo can elaborate. Closing for now since it is an experimental feature that is technically unsupported.
body_text: It is a known issue with using EXPERIMENTAL_ACCUMULATE_N with dynamic_rnn. But it really shouldn't be needed for dynamic_rnn's  already accumulates internally. @yuanbyu  or @ebrevdo can elaborate. Closing for now since it is an experimental feature that is technically unsupported.
body: It is a known issue with using EXPERIMENTAL_ACCUMULATE_N with dynamic_rnn. But it really shouldn't be needed for dynamic_rnn's  already accumulates internally. @yuanbyu  or @ebrevdo can elaborate. Closing for now since it is an experimental feature that is technically unsupported.
